data.headline: Senior DevOps Engineer
data.summary: Experienced DevOps Engineer with a strong background in software development and infrastructure management. Skilled in automating and optimizing cloud-based systems, implementing CI/CD pipelines, and collaborating with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality software solutions.

experience.title: Senior DevOps Engineer
bullets: Designed and implemented scalable, highly available infrastructure using cloud-native technologies
Automated the entire software delivery pipeline, reducing deployment time from 1 hour to 5 minutes
Collaborated with development teams to optimize resource utilization and reduce cloud costs by 25%
Mentored junior engineers and facilitated knowledge-sharing across the organization

experience.title: DevOps Engineer
bullets: Designed and implemented CI/CD pipelines using Jenkins, Ansible, and Kubernetes
Migrated on-premises infrastructure to AWS, improving system reliability and reducing maintenance overhead
Optimized resource utilization and cost management through monitoring and automation

projects.name: Microservices Platform
projects.description: Designed and implemented a scalable, fault-tolerant microservices platform using Kubernetes, Docker, and Istio.

projects.name: DevSecOps Automation
projects.description: Automated the entire software delivery pipeline, including security scanning, compliance checks, and infrastructure provisioning.

data.photo_prompt: Professional LinkedIn-style headshot. The candidate is a middle-aged man with dark hair and a friendly, confident expression.
